synopsis:
Known for being both brilliant and powerful, Miyuki Shirogane and Kaguya Shinomiya lead the illustrious Shuchiin Academy as near equals. Everyone thinks theyâ€™d make a great couple. But with pride and arrogance in ample supply, the only logical move is to trick the other into instigating a date! Who will come out on top in this psychological war where the first move is the only one that matters?

(Source: Funimation)

title.jp: Kaguya-sama wa Kokurasetai: Tensai-tachi no Renai Zunousen
